quote_first: He flicked on the bedside light and picked up his watch. It was
quote_last: . He began to recall what had taken place a few hours earlier.
title: Honor Among Thieves
author: Jeffrey Archer

quote_last: ,” she replied, consulting her broad old gold watch, and then holding it to her ear. “Yes, three minutes to four. I thought it was later. You saw something, William Maubray - you did. You have seen something, haven’t you?”
title: All in the Dark
author: Joseph Sheridan Le Fanu
